); TimelineCard.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, icon: PropTypes.string, description: PropTypes.string.isRequired, date: PropTypes.string, additionalInfo: PropTypes.string, imageSrc: PropTypes.string.isRequired, animation: PropTypes.string.isRequired, }; ProjectCard.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, description: PropTypes.string.isRequired, technologies: PropTypes.string.isRequired, imageSrc: PropTypes.string.isRequired, animation: PropTypes.string.isRequired, }; // Updated CSS-in-JS Styles for block layout and larger images const styles = { iconImage: { width: '80px', // Increase image size height: '80px', objectFit: 'cover', borderRadius: '8px', boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)', }, timelineContent: { display: 'grid', // Use grid layout for blocks gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr))', gap: '1.5rem', }, projectsContainer: { display: 'grid', // Use grid layout for blocks gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr))', gap: '1.5rem', marginTop: '3rem', padding: '2rem', backgroundColor: '#B2EBF2', borderRadius: '8px', boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)', }, // Other styles remain the same }; export default Services;
